name: sleek.js
title: Sleek MVC for node js
author: Cubet Techno Labs, Cochin <info@cubettech.com>
description: Sleek.Js is an MVC Framework implemented from Node.JS, built-in with base dependency on handlebars.js, express.js, mongoose. Sleek.Js architecture follows common format of MVC which makes it easy to handle and build better sites. Easy integration of socket.io for realtime webapps
